text: "Eazy-Duz-It" is a song by American rapper Eazy-E. It is from his debut studio album Eazy-Duz-It. It was released on September 13, 1988. == Single track listing == ===A-side=== #"Eazy-Duz-It" – (4:18) #"Ruthless Villain" – (2:57) ===B-side=== #"Radio" – (5:00) #"Eazy-Duz-It" (radio version) – (3:47) ===Cassette single B-side=== #"Radio" #"Compton's N the House / 100% Diss (Dedicated to the Wacky Wack Crew)" == References == Category:1989 songs
title: Eazy-Duz-It (song)
